scheme_name: Scheme of Assistance for Environment Protection Measures: Scheme for assistance to Environment Management
details: The "Scheme of Assistance for Environment Protection Measures" is an umbrella scheme launched by the Industries and Mines Department, Gujarat under the Gujarat Industrial Policy. Effective from August 7th, 2020 to August 6th, 2025, this initiative promotes sustainable industrial growth by supporting industries in adopting eco-friendly practices and ensuring compliance with environmental norms.
benefits: Implementation of cleaner production technology in place of existing processes such as substitution and optimization of raw materials, reduction water consumption or energy consumption, or waste generation
Upto 35% of the cost of plant and machinery with a ceiling of ₹35,00,000/- during the operative period of the scheme for MSME
Upto 10% of the cost of plant and machinery with a ceiling of ₹35,00,000/- during the operative period of the scheme for large projects
eligibility: The industry/unit must be registered under relevant industrial laws in Gujarat
The industry/unit must comply with existing environmental regulations and standards
The industry/unit must be engaged in manufacturing or production activities
The industry/unit must undertake projects focused on environmental protection measures
application_process: Step-1: The applicant enterprise has to fill out the prescribed application form
Step-2: Attach all relevant documents as required under the scheme guidelines
Step-3: Submit the completed application form and documents to the Industries Commissionerate or the concerned District Industries Centre
Step-4: Ensure that the application is submitted within six months from the date of completion of the activity or project
documents_required: Copy of the Constitution of Enterprise
Project Completion Certificate/ Commissioning Certificate with project completion date
Expenditure statement approved by Chartered Accountant in prescribed proforma as per Annexure ES1
Justification of the comparative benefits of the implemented project with details of data and % reduction in raw material/ water/ energy consumption or waste generation
Copy of EM registration/ IEM Part-B/ Udyog Aadhaar Memorandum (UAM)/ Udyam Registration (UR) (as the case may be)
Process Diagram with brief note on existing and new technology adopted for the project
Last year balance sheet of enterprise
Bank statements for expenditures incurred in the project
Copy of any other financial assistance granted by GoG and/or GoI for the same component/project (if not granted, then give undertaking)
Undertaking for outstanding Government dues and any pending court case against the government
